data.text: @EricTopol @chrischirp @ScienceMagazine Rhetorical commentary. Nothing more. So many people producing fluff articles.
@Tomblvd @RadCentrism @EricTopol @Daltmann10 @chrischirp @ScienceMagazine Not much thinking going on, just parroting easy statements.
@RadCentrism @EricTopol @Daltmann10 @chrischirp @ScienceMagazine You cant ventilate a virus away from society...

@EricTopol @chrischirp @ScienceMagazine Get the countries where these diseases originate to change how they behave with regards animal husbandry. Isolate countries where diseases develop and support them. Do not allow viruses to spread internationally. UK had to do it with BSE.
@EricTopol @chrischirp @ScienceMagazine Imagine if the group she is a representative of hadn't demanded so much money be squandered on pointless plastic for politicised campaign purposes
@EricTopol @chrischirp @ScienceMagazine You are a shame @EricTopol Your moral is a disgrace.

@rwmacleod @veltcardio @rhysmarcus100 @EricTopol @chrischirp @ScienceMagazine @uksciencechief You may "LoL"; look around you at people walking around outdoors wearing a bit of grotty cloth on their faces or driving about in their cars alone wearing one! It's like Linus and his blanket. https://t.co/2PNmudQbNe

@veltcardio @rhysmarcus100 @EricTopol @chrischirp @ScienceMagazine @uksciencechief Meh, most people want simple rules. I think people are over thinking this policy. From the point of view of public health, n95 masks worn in public indoor spaces, help reduce transmission a bit. When hospitals are at risk, throw everything you have at the problem.
